display_html:
class Monad m => Mutable m a where
  • type Ref m a = (v :: Type) | v -> a
  • thawRef :: a -> m (Ref m a)
  • freezeRef :: Ref m a -> m a
  • copyRef :: Ref m a -> a -> m ()
  • modifyRef :: Ref m a -> (a -> a) -> m ()
  • modifyRef' :: Ref m a -> (a -> a) -> m ()
  • updateRef :: Ref m a -> (a -> (a, b)) -> m b
  • updateRef' :: Ref m a -> (a -> (a, b)) -> m b
name: Mutable Ref thawRef freezeRef copyRef modifyRef updateRef modifyRef' updateRef'

display_html:
newtype MutRef a = MutRef {
  • runMutRef :: a
}
name: MutRef MutRef runMutRef

display_html: class Monad m => GMutable m f
name: GMutable

display_html:
newtype GRef m a = GRef {

}

name: gFreezeRef

name: gCopyRef

name: reMutable

name: reMutableConstraint

name: ReMutable ReMutable

  • norm_2 :: a -> c
  • quadrance :: a -> c
name: Metric <.> norm_0 norm_1 norm_2 norm_inf quadrance

display_html:
class (Mutable m a, Linear c a) => LinearInPlace m c a where
  • (.+.=) :: Ref m a -> a -> m ()
  • (.*=) :: Ref m a -> c -> m ()
  • (.*+=) :: Ref m a -> (c, a) -> m ()
name: LinearInPlace .+.= .*= .*+=

data SimpleOpts m i a b = SO {
  • soEpochs :: Maybe Int

  • soSink :: ConduitT a Void m b
}

data SOOptimizer :: (Type -> Type) -> (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type -> Type where

  • SOParallel :: MonadUnliftIO m => ParallelOpts m a -> SOOptimizer m m i a
  • SOParChunked :: MonadUnliftIO m => ParallelOpts m a -> SOOptimizer m (StateT [i] m) i a
name: SOOptimizer SOSingle SOParallel SOParChunked
